description: Anchovy is the surprise ingredient that takes these lamb burgers to the next level flavour-wise.
name: Lamb & Anchovy Burgers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium red onion, peeled, 1 grated, 1 chopped into rings
1 medium lemon, juice and 1/2 tsp of zest

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the lamb mince, grated onion, anchovies, gherkins, lemon zest and parsley together in a bowl. Shape into 4 patties with your hands.
Preheat the oven to 170Â°C. Heat the oil in a large pan on high heat and cook the burgers for 2 minutes on each side. Place on a baking tray and cook in the oven for 15 minutes.
Toss the mixed leaves with lemon juice in a bowl. Toast the buns to your liking, spread with mayo, top with a burger, leaves and red onion rings and serve.
